Pingtung County in south Taiwan
Pingtung City in south Taiwan

sentences.english: According to Taiwanese television reports, a mudslide may have buried another village in Pingtung county.
sentences.chinese: 中國臺灣電視臺報道，泥石流淹沒了屏東縣的另村莊。

sentences.english: National Pingtung University of Science and Technology (NPUST) was first founded in 1924 as an agricultural high school.
sentences.chinese: 國立屏東科技大學創校於1924年，以農校起家。

sentences.english: Shielded tunnel of South Link Line, Ping-Tung.
sentences.chinese: 嘉和掩體隧道，屏東縣南迴線鐵路。

sentences.english: Analysis of slope disaster in Shihzih Township, Pingtung Country… 5.
sentences.chinese: 臺灣屏東縣獅子鄉坡地災害潛勢分析。

sentences.english: It's from Pingtung County in the south, where she was born.
sentences.chinese: 那塊鮪魚來自南方的屏東，她的出生地。

sentences.english: Most of the teachers teaching in elementary schools in Pingtung County had cognized well in campus zero corporal punishment.
sentences.chinese: 屏東縣國小教師大多數已具有校園零體罰之認知。

sentences.english: This study applied convenience cluster sampling to select one elementary school sixth-year students in Pingtung County as subjects.
sentences.chinese: 本研究選擇以屏東縣某國小六年級學生爲研究對象。
